website_summaries.verdict: A handsome pair of knives that  perform as good as they look and have gained many satisfied customers thanks to the superior quality.
pros: Owners love the versatility, look, and performance that make them a good value for the price
The duo includes a 9" multi-purpose slicer and an 8" chef knife that both sport ergonomic handles that are comfortable to grip
cons: Some cooks may find them too long for basic cutting needs, but this small concern doesn't interfere with their cutting abilities
A few reports of dull knives, but most consumers raved about the sharpness of the blades

customer_reviews.title: Good for most things but not bread.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Chef Knife: Good for most cutting and chopping. Multi-purpose Slicer: Great for cheese, Poor for bread. Bought this combo because I thought was getting a chef knife + bread slicer but slicer knife didn't work out for bread so having to purchase an additional bread slicer. Update: Have been using the Chef Knife for a year now. Still in good condition. Often is washed in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Page Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great surface, poor edge
customer_reviews.text: Pros: These knives do not stick to anything. Expect a clean cut through that gooey cake. Lightweight Cheap Cons: These knives are dull and do not keep an edge well. Need to sharpen often. You're buying these knives for the coating, not the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Maeder

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these knives.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these knives. They are great looking and extremely sharp. These are my go to knives.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality is just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are good knives and you should consider them when searching for kitchen equipment. But they don't seem to hold an edge as well as I would like and the saw teeth on the one are very small and I am considering just sharpening it down and make it a regular blade. Like I said, they are not so good but not so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love these knife
customer_reviews.text: Love these knife. For fathers-day,, I got a similar knife by Red Cooper Chef which is not made as well as these Copper Chef knives. These knives are much heavier and have good coating of copper..Don't be fooled
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife but I’m afraid of it now
customer_reviews.text: I have used the straight slicing knife twice Ive cut myself both times.where the blade connects to the handle is razor sharp. the blade is wider than the handle and it is unprotected where the blade and handle meets. Nice knife but I’m afraid of it now.Be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I have a ceramic knife that cuts much better for slicing in almost all situations
customer_reviews.text: They are okay, but don't really seem to be all that sharp. I have a ceramic knife that cuts much better for slicing in almost all situations.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous products
customer_reviews.text: I gave these for a gift too - I love these products - they are so light and easy to use - I'm buying everything I can find in Copper Chef....
customer_reviews.author: More fun

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Fake copper chef, ordered because I love copper chef stuff, in the pictures.of the item they are selling it has copper chef wrote on the knife like it's supposed to be but on the actual item nothing is on it and the package for the knifes seem fake... & knifes not sharp, fell like I been scammed
customer_reviews.author: Amaya Jonay White

customer_reviews.title: Happy slicing..
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered them ! I love them--now I always have a sharp knife for any job I have to do. I recommend them to everyone that cooks. Dull knife frustration gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer   Ruth Harris

product_meta.title: TRISTAR PRODUCTS CCK 2 Piece Copper Chef Knife Set
product_meta.description: As Seen On TV Copper Chef Knife Set contains an 8” professional chef knife and 9” multi-purpose slicer that ensures quick and simple cutting, minimizing food prep time. Professional Chef Knife features a comfort handle guaranteeing a secure grip and forked tip for added convenience. Multi-Purpose Slicer is equipped with a super sharp, stainless steel blade plus includes a dial cutting design easily cutting through even the toughest of foods.
feature_bullets: Comfort handle for a secure grip

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
